doc.field: Group shr 18.34 yen vs 58.72 Net 10.73 billion yen vs 37.06 billion Pretax 27.76 billion yen vs 84.78 billion Operating 30.06 billion yen vs 88.81 billion Sales 889.22 billion vs 955.78 billion Note - The company attributed the profit fall largely to the yen's appreciation during the period. Domestic sales rose 0.4 pct to 274.17 billion yen from a year earlier while exports declined 9.9 pct to 615.04 billion. REUTER
